column2: ENGLISH
will not be able to send ministers to your systems for the next five years, unless [This.GetHerHis] §YState Intrigue§! is higher than yours.\n

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Closed Borders
I grow tired of your persistent attempts at violating the sovereignty of my people. Our security agents have been instructed not to allow any [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] officials entry into the [From.Capital.GetName] System.
You will not be able to send any ministers to §Y[From.GetFullName]§!'s systems for the next five years, unless your §YState Intrigue§! is higher than [From.GetHersHis].
will withdraw from the congress.
Petition for Membership

Petition to become a member state of the [This.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. If [This.GetTitle] [This.GetFullName] accepts, you will become [This.GetHerHis] vassal. You will have to obey [This.GetHerHis] orders, but [This.GetSheHe] will protect you from your enemies.
Petitioned For Membership
Rejected Membership Petition
Approved Membership Petition
Protected My Enemies
Protected Me From My Enemies

TO: [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
FROM: [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
RE: Petition for membership
The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] humbly petitions to be allowed to join the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] as a member state.

TO: [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
FROM: [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
RE: Petition for membership
Your request for membership in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is hereby approved.

TO: [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
FROM: [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
RE: Attacks against our nation
The [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is now a member state of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and your continued attacks against our territory will no longer be tolerated.

TO: [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
FROM: [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
RE: Petition for membership
Your request for membership in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is hereby rejected.
You are making preparations for a grand congress. Its purpose will be to negotiate the reformation of the [Root.Capital.Empire.GetFullName].
is invited to the congress.
TO: [Root.GetFullName], [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]\nFROM: [From.GetFullName]

The preliminary negotiations are complete - all those remaining have agreed, in principle, to reforming the [Root.Capital.Empire.GetFullName]. However, there is still the matter of the new constitution. First is the matter of how new leaders will be selected.
Leaders will be elected by a federal council.
TO: [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]\nFROM: [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]\nI will hereby attend to your congress
TO: [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]\nFROM: [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]\nYour will to see me in this congress is hereby rejected
The congress convenes
Leaders that has accepted to participate arrive
is coming
chooses Federal Elective
The attendees are now choosing between a Senate Rule or A Ruling by Decree
You choose to establish a senate
You choose not to establish a senate and rule by decree
Nobody came to your congress. It is a huge failure and one that diminished your prestige like never before.
is informed
is informed
Welcome to the Confederation
Someone has demanded for a Senate to be institued
obtains the Senate intitution. Having obtained his will, he doesnt leave the congress
Your confederation congress is an absolute success. You have gained a new lordship above greater lands and are now the ruler of a confederation. You will be remembered throughout time.
We will use the traditional laws of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

The preliminary negotations are complete - all those remaining have agreed, in principle, to reforming the [Root.Capital.Empire.GetFullName], and you have begun discussing the matter of the new constitution. [From.GetFullName] has proposed the creation of a federal council, who will elect new leaders.

The preliminary negotations are complete - all those remaining have agreed, in principle, to reforming the [Root.Capital.Empire.GetFullName], and you have begun discussing the matter of the new constitution. [From.GetFullName] wishes to select leaders according to the traditional laws of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
I have no objections.
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] demands elections by a federal council.

Your proposal has not gone over as well as you'd hoped - [From.GetFullName] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has demanded that leaders be elected by a federal council, and is threatening to withdraw from the congress if this demand is not met.
After objections raised by [FromFrom.GetFullName] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.FullName] has agreed that leaders will be elected by a federal council.

[From.GetFullName] has refused to agree to your entirely reasonable demands for an equal say in the leadership of the new federation. It is clear that [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has no place in this congress.

[FromFrom.GetFullName] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and [From.GetFullName] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] are at loggerheads over the issue of how the new federation's leadership will be selected. Infuriated, [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has withdrawn from the congress.
Break Up The [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]
As [Root.GetTitle], you have absolute power over the abominable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. It is time that this oppressive empire ceased to exist altogether.
As [Root.GetTitle], you have absolute power over the abominable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. It is time that this oppressive empire ceased to exist altogether.
End of an Empire

[From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] has issued a shocking proclamation - henceforth, the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] no longer exists. It is to be immediately dissolved, and its major regional governments allowed to go free.
Ask for a Gift
Ask [This.GetFullName] to send you a gift of cash, either in exchange for a future favor or to repay one [This.GetSheHe] already owes you.
Money is tight. You need an extra shot of cash, and [From.GetFullName] has some to spare.
Time to call in the favor [From.GetSheHe] owes me.
Hopefully, [From.GetSheHe]'ll do it in return for a future favor.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial assistance
I once did you a particular service. I now hope that you will repay me. I am in dire need of financial assistance, and ask that you send me a small contribution.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial assistance
Done. The money is yours. Consider the two of us even.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial assistance
I'm sorry, but I cannot afford to pay you at this time. I hope that this difficulty will not come between us in the future.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial assistance
I am in dire need of additional funds. If you would send me a small contribution, I would be happy to repay the favor at a later date.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial assistance
I have sent you the money as requested. I hope that you will be willing to repay this favor in the future.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial assistance
I'm sorry, but I cannot afford to pay you at the moment. You will have to look elsewhere.
